item.title: Natural language processing of safety reports in nuclear plants and aviation
item.description: This project will focus on extracting concise structured information about incidents in nuclear plants and in aviation that are currently described in lengthy document reports. By structuring this information and mapping it to safety models and standards, we can help improve their operations.

item.title: Natural language processing of safety reports in nuclear plants and aviation
item.description:
Description

This project will focus on extracting concise structured information about incidents in nuclear plants and in aviation that are currently described in lengthy document reports. By structuring this information and mapping it to safety models and standards, we can help improve their operations.
